name: Space Gardener
description:
Space Gardener is a relaxing little experience about tending a garden on a rock in space. It's meant to be calming and peaceful to help you decompress a bit. I recommend playing it with sound on and with a cup of tea and maybe a nice biscuit. Please enjoy.

"...it's a game that feels great to play, and sometimes that's all you need." -PC Gamer

"Yes, it's simple and slow, but it's lovely." -Rock Paper Shotgun

"The freedom to build and grow makes for one very entertaining game." -Initials Video Games

"Go relax with "Space Gardener" now!" -Indie Retro News

I'm @like100bears on twitter if you have questions or comments <3
This game was made as a school project in far less than 11 weeks.

Grandma Engine by Matt Thorson (http://mattmakesgames.com/)

Version 1.01 notes:
You can now rebind the controls by editing the included controls.ini file. This file can be found in the install directory or the .zip file.

Careful with the escape key, it will quit the game.
Remember to save!
